title: note.template Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response from the `note.template` request. When `verify` is set to `true`, returns the current template information. Otherwise, returns success status of the template operation.

success.description: Whether the template was set successfully

template.description: When `verify` is `true`, returns the current template body for the specified Notefile

file.description: When `verify` is `true`, returns the Notefile name for which the template is set

length.description: When `verify` is `true`, returns the maximum payload length configured for the template

format.description: When `verify` is `true`, returns the format setting for the template

port.description: When `verify` is `true` and on LoRa/Starnote, returns the port number assigned to the Notefile
